title: L'or, Plate 16 from "Les Toquades"
marks:
Title, inscription, stamp

ULC, in the plate: [5 LRC, in pencil: [L\'cer (?) 2044]
description: kneeling man wearing slippers, pants, a shirt with rolled-up sleeves and a cap, reaching both hands into a hole in the ground; small bag and shovel near tree at R
